attributes.action: Create a law for shops to turn off TVs and save electric.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Shops that have electric departments that sell TVs, always have them all switched to the same channel all day.
This uses ALOT of electric, the government are trying to get everyone to go green which I'm in full support of. I believe there should be a stamp down or some type of law so that the shops only turn on a TV when requested by a customer.
